name: Editor Wysiwyg Background Color
author: FADI Mohamed

sections.description:
Wysiwyg Editor Background color is an plugin that came to me to solve the problem of writing in color on a background of the same color.

This plugin lets you change the editor’s background color to the color you want

Features

  • Very Easy To Use
  • Supports Any Theme
  • Supports Custom Posts Types
  • Supports ACF

If you like this plugin, please leave a review

Donations

Believe it or not, there is a lot of work behind the plugins and themes we develop. We do not want that in the future we have to make them premium is why we ask your support with a small contribution; this will motivate us to further develop themes and plugins that are free.

Donate and support the development of free plugins like this
sections.installation:
From your WordPress dashboard

  1. Visit ‘Plugins > Add New’
  2. Search for ‘Editor Wysiwyg Background Color’
  3. Activate Editor Wysiwyg Background Color from your Plugins page.
  4. Go To Plugin Settings and select your desired options
  5. If somethig looks weird after update clear your browser cache
  6. Visit Any post type from your admin and click on the color picker “yellow” button in the editor

From WordPress.org

  1. Download Editor Wysiwyg Background Color.
  2. Upload the ‘Editor Wysiwyg Background Color’ directory to your ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory, using your favorite method (ftp, sftp, scp, etc…)
  3. Activate Editor Wysiwyg Background Color from your Plugins page.
  4. Go To Plugin Settings and select your desired options
  5. If somethig looks weird after update clear your browser cache
  6. Visit Any post type from your admin and click on the color picker “yellow” button in the editor
